website_summaries.verdict: A quality wooden wobble board that's tough enough to support most users and comes with its own workout program.
pros: Nonslip padding on the top of the board
Includes free access to an online workout program
cons: Some users find this balance board to be too challenging for them

customer_reviews.title: Strictly for humans.
customer_reviews.text: You’re asking about Stability? You guys know what this is right? Anyway my wife likes it but the cats don’t. We don’t have a dog so I can’t comment on that but my friend Bob has a jack russell thats pretty clever I wouldn’t be surprised if he could do it - not that my cats are stupid quite the opposite but their balance is pretty good so I reckon they just don’t see the point. I might buy my wife some roller skates next.
customer_reviews.author: pickymickey

customer_reviews.title: Balance Is Essential
customer_reviews.text: I am 71 years old and balance has become very important to me. I never thought about balance when I was young but as we age, balance is something we have to work at. I purchased this Wooden balance Board to help me work on my balance. It arrived and I was pleased to see how sturdy it is. The downloadable booklet gave me all that I need to start working on it. I think this Wooden Balance Board is going to be a great help for me to reach my goals.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Tomchik

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have in your arsenal!
customer_reviews.text: Whether you are rehabbing from an injury or just want to work on balance and core strength.. this board is a necessity! As a Physical Therapist Assistant, I purchased Wooden Balance Board out of pure curiosity! I didn’t know what to expect after I ordered it but I was definitely surprised by the quality of this product! Its sleek design and non-slip design this is without a doubt one of the best balance boards on the market today! This board comes with a FREE downloadable E-Book with 20 different exercises as well! So whether you need a device to help with your balance or are trying to recover/prevent injury this is a must have in your arsenal!
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Good for Balance and Ankle Exercises
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item on doctor's orders to strengthen my daughter's oddly-weak ankles. (Everyone has a weak spot. That happens to be hers.) Used as directed, it has worked wonders. First, she just sat and rotated the board with her feet. Then she started by doing just 15 seconds per day on each ankle, standing. She is now up to the doctor-recommended two minutes. It's also very useful for improving balance.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDenizen

customer_reviews.title: Improving balance for Senior Citizen
customer_reviews.text: I am using my balance board to improve my balance. As I am aging, I am losing my balance and I have found this board very helpful in improving my balance. I am still at the stage where I have to be close to something to hold on when I feel insecure, but I do see improvement. I love this board.
customer_reviews.author: VBlady

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Nice non-slip surface. Bought to continue my afer surgery PT ankle rotation exercises at home. The half sphere under the platform is a bit larger than the one at the PT, but I think it will get the job done! I am not using it for balancing, so I cannot speak to that.
customer_reviews.author: C.W.

customer_reviews.title: Stretch & Strengthen Legs, Improves Balance
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It is very challenging, but the eBook is very helpful and easy to download. I recommend bracing yourself with a chair(s) until you get the hang of it. We bought it primarily for my wife to improve her balance. Not only is it helping with her balance and concentration, it stretches and strengthens her legs. She uses this a couple of times a week in addition to her regular workout and really likes it. It is a great addition to our daily workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: First time using a balance board (and mad that I didn't buy one before now)!
customer_reviews.text: First time really using a balance board. It is helping my back/sciatica issues and firing up little muscles I never think of or use on a regular basis. Don't have much to add to other positive reviews but wanted to give a shout-out as this is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tilliebird

customer_reviews.title: I didn't even know i had muscles there
customer_reviews.text: I bought this board because I have very weak ankles and wanted a fun way to strengthen my ankles especially as I have gotten into running. A few minutes on this board you can definitely feel the board working muscles in your feet. For example wobbling side to slide and front and back. What's the best part - it's a very fun board to wobble on while you watch TV. The whole family loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: I saw this balancing board in the office one day, one of my colleagues was using it. He let me try it for few days and I really loved it. We have a standing desk and i spend most of my day standing and working on my computer. you can really feel it on your legs, thighs,calves and back, even on our belly. It's really good. the product itself it sturdy. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Dawit

customer_reviews.title: which is a good thing as I'm up for a challenge
customer_reviews.text: This is trickier to use than it looks, which is a good thing as I'm up for a challenge. I've already noticed improvement in my balance from playing around with this. I do stand next to a counter or chair still since I'm 66 and definitely out of shape. But I've gone from not holding on for 2 seconds up to 30 seconds. I'm enjoying this simple, but great tool!
customer_reviews.author: C J Burt

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Trying to defeet plantar fasciatis thru physical therapy sessions. Did not realize how weak one of my ankles were until had to use their wobble board. Bought this one so I could exercise at home. Very similar to the professional model used at the P/T facility. Use it 2x/day. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Great for experienced and beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST balance board I have ever used. It also comes with a PDF to help beginners. I took this to my CrossFit gym and everyone was really impressed with the workmanship of this board.
customer_reviews.author: Rossi Family

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed. Sturdy and broad. I can't balance on it very well but that's not because of the product! Also came with a PDF to learn different ways to exercise with the board. Has a non-slip surface which made it pretty handy for gripping.
customer_reviews.author: BetterAnnaMac

customer_reviews.title: So my physical therapist recommended me to get the profitness balance board for knee ...
customer_reviews.text: I really consider myself to be a very active person. I have always played different type of sports and workout out all my life. But about 2 years ago i go surgery on my right knee and its been really slowing me down. So my physical therapist recommended me to get the profitness balance board for knee rehab. I purchased the balance board and have been using it for about3 weeks now and its been really helping out my muscle strength around my knee. I been able to use it for other exercises as well, been watching the youtube video that the balance board comes with. Great product, very happy purchase. I am glad my physical therapist recommended this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to see your progress and increased balance the next day.
customer_reviews.text: I've really gotten good with this wobble board. It's easy to see progress and increased balance the next day. Does a good job of working out your lower body as well.
customer_reviews.author: Y93FoxAINASA

customer_reviews.title: works fine although heavier than the plastic equivalent it replaced
customer_reviews.text: couldn't find the plastic reebok version so tried this instead. functionally equivalent although seems about twice the weight -- which would matter for few people.
customer_reviews.author: billyjoe

customer_reviews.title: Using this at my standing desk is a work out ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this at my standing desk is a work out, for sure. Was expecting something with more subtle balance shifts... the ball underneath this board that you balance on is actually quite high, so you can't stop paying attention to balancing!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Leanne Morse

customer_reviews.title: Well built and safe.
customer_reviews.text: I recieved mine a few days ago. So far so good. It's not as hard as I first thought it would be. I have pretty decent balance to start but for those times I do loose my concentration it hard to fall off. The board is wide enough to hit the floor before you fall. That was my main concern.
customer_reviews.author: Copper

customer_reviews.title: Compact and useful for all ages, whether in shape or not
customer_reviews.text: A good equipment as part of your rehab exercises for your knees. I would also highly recommend this for healthy folks as well. Some of the exercises while balancing or squatting can be pretty challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Desiguy29

customer_reviews.title: I wish I kept this, but gave it to ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I kept this, but gave it to my niece's kids as they are into Ninja training. Thought it would help them (as it would me too!) for balance and core training. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. M.

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought for someone else and they havent complained. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Great for surfing/SUP training
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It's not only fun but an excellent balance trainer. Using this has done wonders for my stand up paddleboarding. Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: mark t barnhardt

customer_reviews.title: Favorite purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! All I can say! This board is lot more challenging than I thought and that makes me happy because it puts up a challenge for me! It's an awesome purchase to keep in your home and do quick strengthening exercises!! By far my favorite purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Balancing Act
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, well-constructed wooden balance board. The sandpaper top helps prevent sliding off the board while in use. It's a challenging workout to just get your core balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Velikova

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy so far
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy so far. They will give you a link to an instrctional video, but there are other videos on how to use a baps board out there too. I personally don't like any exercies that has my knees go past my toes went doing knee bends, but the other exercises are helpful. No slip surface works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was scared to even stand on the board. However, as I follow the ebook instruction & youtube video (from the stage holding a chair), I was able to balance on. I still need much more practice, but I think the exercise using the board is helpful for my weak ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Slowbut

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact. Ebook that is easily downloaded gives easy to follow hints and instructions for simple exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A

customer_reviews.title: Useage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for under desk at work, used a similar one at PT appointments
customer_reviews.author: MeMe

customer_reviews.title: Keep practicing.  It gets easier.
customer_reviews.text: Hard at first, but after a few days of practice it gets easier. Having a better sense of balance is important to me as I get older, making me less likely to injure myself by falling.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ruggera

customer_reviews.title: luv it
customer_reviews.text: The product was as descried and fast shipment was appreciated. I am very happy that I decided to purchase this item! great product! thank you!
customer_reviews.author: jessica clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The board is great but the customer service is even better. My board had a small manufacturing flaw and they replaced it with no questions. I'm looking forward to using this product to tone muscles and control balance . Regards, John
customer_reviews.author: Luigi Falconi

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Small enough it doesn't take up much room but big enough to stand on. Perfect for someone who doesn't have a lot of room to store fitness equipment.
customer_reviews.author: K.A. Cranton

customer_reviews.title: Rehab
customer_reviews.text: balance board helps with strengthening foot ligaments and muscles where it was needed, works great for rehab exercises also..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Very sturdy and nice grip tape on top.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Nice board, well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made, really nice board. I enjoy using it. Great to build core strength.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cuff

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! My balance has gotten so much better since I started using this and it's much easier to run up and down stairs now.
customer_reviews.author: Imbrose

customer_reviews.title: No instruction booklet included
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved it so have not used it yet. It said there was an instruction booklet inside but there was none. It would be helpful if it was actually included as I've never used a balance board before.
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this and my son loves it. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndia Rios-Myers

customer_reviews.title: WHERE IS THE DOWNLOADABLE EXERCISE EBOOK?
customer_reviews.text: Got my profitness balance board yesterday. It came with a card to download 20 different exercises. When I go to the url says site doesn't exist. Is there an updated url I can try?
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Daly

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made, no flex in the board while balancing on it. Feels like it'll last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t do anything for me . Not High enough to really work on balance .
customer_reviews.author: Lashawna

customer_reviews.title: Great while at your stand up desk!
customer_reviews.text: Almost all day every work day on this and it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: DOES THE JOB VERY WELL! BALANCE IS IMPROVING, SURPRISING RAPIDLY FOR AN 82 YEAR OLD.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN D.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, is fun, no creaks even holding up my 305 lbs!
customer_reviews.author: Gregg E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome follow up for physical therapy!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, had foot surgery this helps in strengthening my leg muscles and improve my balance.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Plywood is splitting and the blue decal is pealing off and I've only had the item for a month and a half.. VERY cheaply made. Don't buy this one..find a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good board to balance if you aren't clumsy like me.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Foot and Ankle Strengther
customer_reviews.text: Made strong, and durable. Item is exactly as described by the mfg. A definite benefit to my triple arthrodesis to my ankle and foot
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Provided the e-book and YouTube video is added values.
customer_reviews.author: Samiwangskie

customer_reviews.title: It's Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am using it to help get my balance back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is highly recommended for anyone that has had their ankle injured it ...
customer_reviews.text: this is highly recommended for anyone that has had their ankle injured it helped mine a lot when i was trying to get it back to 100%. it also helped my overall stability a lot.
customer_reviews.author: zeldaeln

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient to have. It has increased my balance and core strength tremendously. I use it everyday when warming and have noticed a difference right away.
customer_reviews.author: Kylen

customer_reviews.title: The balance board is awesome! What's great about it is the various ways ...
customer_reviews.text: The balance board is awesome! What's great about it is the various ways in which you can use it in order to isolate different muscles; while at the same time improving balance and stability. AWESOME product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Yannuzzi

customer_reviews.title: Rehab , balance
customer_reviews.text: Great for ankle rehab , balance work . Would recommend this . Great product , for any athlete .
customer_reviews.author: reno raines

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this with my stand up desk and I'm really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I was at first impressed until the laminated wood layers began separating after only one use. I have returned the product and purchased a wobble board from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always had balance problems but since I got this I ...
customer_reviews.text: Always had balance problems but since I got this I have been working on it every day, it helps a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This board has met all of my expectations and I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this balance board because I used a similar board in therapy. This board has met all of my expectations and I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Keiser

customer_reviews.title: Harder than it appears
customer_reviews.text: But I’m enjoying this balance board. I feel the results in my legs, hips, stomach, and back. I’m a fan of the ProFitness brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald McClain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great board to help with ankle mobility! Delivered on time and as promised
customer_reviews.author: Ines Honne

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to strengthen feet and ankles
customer_reviews.text: As expected in terms of quality and seeming durability- a bit soon to review on longevity. Will update as can on how the product helped. Purchased to increase nimbleness and agility in feet and strengthen core. So far it seems the feet will benefit much more than core.
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This is a very dangerous item for a 77 year old, slightly overweight senior. Sits too high off the floor and even with holding on to a chair you may be in for a bad fall. I had to pay $9.00+ to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Becke

customer_reviews.title: Wibbly-wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Man, this thing is hard to stand on. Keep your wife away from it. If she heads for it dial 911 into your cell and hold your thumb over the send button. Do not look away. It can go bad faster than you could ever imagine.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Hankins

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is for a person with a death wish or an acrobat.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Patricia Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what I will use this for since I've not used it since I bought it. Would not say it's good workout. Kettle bell is better idea.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

product_meta.title: ProFitness Wooden Balance Board (15.5-inch by 3.1-inch) - Exercise, Fitness and Physical Therapy - Non-Slip Safety Top - Tone Muscles, Strengthen Core and Injury Rehab
product_meta.description:
Enhance your total body fitness, core strength and flexibility with a strong ProGear wooden balance board made for kids and adults. 

A strong core is essential to a healthy body; when you don’t maintain a strong balance of strength, agility, flexibility and coordination, you’re more susceptible to injuries and health problems you wouldn’t ordinarily suffer. That’s why you need a fun, easy way to build core strength and even recovery from these injuries—the ProGear Wooden Balance Board.

Training, Therapy and Flexibility 

Designed for both kids and adults, our wobble board helps you improve your mental and physical fitness with total body exercises with one safe, stable piece of exercise equipment. From posture to range of motion to agility, the ProGear Wooden Balance Board is a powerful balance training and physical therapy tool that can be used almost anywhere to help you feel better and recovery from injury faster. 

Improved Stability and Design 

Better yet, our balance board features a non-slip top to ensure total mounted stability, as well as the strength to hold men, women and children of all shapes and sizes. Use it a home, at the park, at work, or even at a clinic and stay physically and mentally fit for the future. 

Product Details:

 * Improved Wooden Construction 
 * Lightweight, Portable Design (3.1 lbs.) 
 * Stable Platform with Anti-Slip Safety Top 
 * Safe for Ages 4+ 
 * Weight Limit: 330 lbs. 
 * Size: 15.5” x 3.1” 
 * 30-Day Money Back Guarantee 

Improve your core strength, recovery from injury faster and enhance flexibility and balance by clicking ‘Add to Cart’ above and choosing the ProFitness balance board!
feature_bullets: IMPROVES CORE STRENGTH – Looking to enhance back or hip stability? Want toned abs? Our wobble balance board helps improve your balance, coordination and flexibility while targeting and strengthening core areas of your body.

SUPPORTS INJURY RECOVERY – This wooden balance board provides a stable rehab and physical therapy system for anyone trying to overcome an injury, be it adult athletes or dancers, children playing sports, or seniors after surgery.

QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP – No need to worry about stability while standing, doing pushups or doing balance training. Each balance trainer is made of premium wood and features a non-slip board pad for added safety.
LIGHTWEIGHT, PORTABLE DESIGN – At just under 3 lbs., our wooden balance board lets you take your balance board exercises with you wherever you go. Use it at home, at work, or even at the gym.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – When you need the best balance pad/wobble board for your core strength or injury recovery, choose the ProGear wooden balance board backed by a 30-day money back guarantee.
